document.docAuthor: Asenjo, Angélico, Irmler, Ulrich, Klimaszewski, Jan, Chandler, Donald S., Fierros-López, Hugo Eduardo & Vieira, Juliana S.
document.masterDocTitle: Staphylinidae (Insecta: Coleoptera) in Latin America: synopsis, annotated catalog, diversity and distribution

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Staphylinidae (Insecta: Coleoptera) in Latin America: synopsis, annotated catalog, diversity and distribution

bibRefCitation.author: Thomson, C. G.
bibRefCitation.refString: Thomson, C. G. (1858) Forsok till uppstallning af Sveriges Staphyliner. Ofversigt af Kongliga Vetenskaps-Akademiens Forhandlingar, 15, 27 - 40.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species:
Homalota atricapilla Mulsant & Rey, 1852
1 species is included in this genus from the West Indies.
Other regions: Nearctic, Palaearctic, Ethiopian, Oriental .

bibRefCitation.author: Thomson, C. G.
bibRefCitation.refString: Thomson, C. G. (1858) Forsok till uppstallning af Sveriges Staphyliner. Ofversigt af Kongliga Vetenskaps-Akademiens Forhandlingar, 15, 27 - 40.

bibRefCitation.author: Thomson, C. G.
bibRefCitation.refString: Thomson, C. G. (1859) Skandinaviens Coleoptera, synoptiskt bearbetade. Vol. I. Berlingska Boktryckeriet, Lund, 290 pp.

bibRefCitation.author: Casey, T. L.
bibRefCitation.refString: Casey, T. L. (1906) Observations on the staphylinid groups Aleocharinae and Xantholinini chiefly of America. Transactions of the Academy of Science of St. Louis, 16 (6), 125 - 434.

bibRefCitation.author: Casey, T. L.
bibRefCitation.refString: Casey, T. L. (1906) Observations on the staphylinid groups Aleocharinae and Xantholinini chiefly of America. Transactions of the Academy of Science of St. Louis, 16 (6), 125 - 434.

subSubSection.paragraph: 5 species are included in this genus from Central and South America.
South America: Ecuador , Peru , Chile , Argentina .
Other regions: Nearctic, Palaearctic, Ethiopian, Madagascan, Oriental , Australian.

bibRefCitation.author: Ashe, J. S.
bibRefCitation.refString: Ashe, J. S. (1986) Seeversiella bispinosa, a new genus and species of Athetine Aleocharinae (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae) from North America. Journal of the New York Entomological Society, 94 (4), 500 - 511.

subSubSection.paragraph: 25 species are included in this genus from Central America.
Central America: Mexico , Guatemala , Honduras , El Salvador , Costa Rica , Panama .
